alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 12:31PM CDT until July 22 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southwestern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Eastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/. * At 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Webb to near Hartford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Headland, Dothan, Blakely, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Centerville, Malvern, Rehobeth, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Avon and Napier Field. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
